explanation: [0-0] In a crowded football stadium, three people in yellow vests are sitting on the sidelines facing the audience, while another person in a yellow vest is standing on the sidelines with their back to the camera. A player in a red and white jersey is standing at the edge of the field, raising his right hand, while a black and white football is placed at the corner of the field. Black subtitles appear at the top of the screen, displaying "Leroy Sané shows spectacular mentality," followed by a red "100."

[0-8] The player in the red and white jersey starts running towards the ball and kicks it. The ball passes between players in red and white jerseys and blue jerseys. Another player in a red and white jersey tries to intercept the ball, but a player in a blue jersey intercepts it first. At this point, the player in the red and white jersey is circled in red, indicating that he is the protagonist of this video, Leroy Sané. The player in the blue jersey starts dribbling forward with the ball, and Leroy Sané follows closely behind, trying to catch up.
